view.borrowed

Class BorrowedAddGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.borrowed.BorrowedAddGUI

  • public class BorrowedAddGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    GUI class in charge of the view used for adding borrowed items

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BorrowedAddGUI() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBorrowed()
      Method for adding a new borrowed thing to the database If the user inputs are not valid, displays an error message to the user After the new item is created, returns to the main borrowed items view
      void cancelAddBorrowed()
      Method for canceling the adding of a new borrowed thing Exits the add view and returns to the main view
      java.lang.String getBorrowedDescription()
      Method for getting the value of the borrowedThing description text field

      Method for getting the date when the item has been borrowed
      java.lang.String getBorrowedPerson()
      Method for getting the borrower from the combo box
      java.sql.Date getBorrowedReturnDate()
      Method for getting the date when the item will be returned
      void initialize()
      Initialize-method called when the class is created Fetches the list of people in the database to whom items can be loaned
